message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to let it go for $150.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product. I would like to counter with an offer of $120.
I understand you're interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go as low as $120. I can meet you halfway at $135. I think it's a fair price considering the value it will bring to you.
I appreciate your response, Alice. I'm still hoping to find a price closer to my budget. I would like to counter with an offer of $125.
I'm still not willing to go below $140. I think it's a fair price considering the product's value and the time we've already discussed it. I'm willing to meet you at $140.
I understand your position, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $130.

I'm getting closer to my minimum price, but I'm still not willing to go below $145. I think it's the best price I can offer considering the product's value and our previous discussions. I'm willing to meet you at $145.
I appreciate your effort, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $140.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, and I'm willing to meet you at $142.50. I think it's a fair price considering the product's value and our previous discussions.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. Considering the negotiations and my budget, I would like to counter with an offer of $140.
